meaningMnemonic: 中国 is China, right? That's what this 中 represents. And, of course the Chinese are known for being super showy, which is why you have <kanji>showy</kanji> there.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
